Uses of Interface
java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener

Packages that use WindowFocusListener
java.awt Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces and for painting graphics and images. 
java.awt.event Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by AWT components. 
javax.swing Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms. 
javax.swing.plaf.basic Provides user interface objects built according to the Basic look and feel. 
 

Uses of WindowFocusListener in java.awt
 

Classes in java.awt that implement WindowFocusListener
 class AWTEventMulticaster
          A class which implements efficient and thread-safe multi-cast event dispatching for the AWT events defined in the java.awt.event package.
 

Methods in java.awt that return WindowFocusListener
static WindowFocusListener AWTEventMulticaster.add(WindowFocusListener a, WindowFocusListener b)
          Adds window-focus-listener-a with window-focus-listener-b and returns the resulting multicast listener.
 WindowFocusListener[] Window.getWindowFocusListeners()
          Returns an array of all the window focus listeners registered on this window.
static WindowFocusListener AWTEventMulticaster.remove(WindowFocusListener l, WindowFocusListener oldl)
          Removes the old window-focus-listener from window-focus-listener-l and returns the resulting multicast listener.
 

Methods in java.awt with parameters of type WindowFocusListener
static WindowFocusListener AWTEventMulticaster.add(WindowFocusListener a, WindowFocusListener b)
          Adds window-focus-listener-a with window-focus-listener-b and returns the resulting multicast listener.
 void Window.addWindowFocusListener(WindowFocusListener l)
          Adds the specified window focus listener to receive window events from this window.
static WindowFocusListener AWTEventMulticaster.remove(WindowFocusListener l, WindowFocusListener oldl)
          Removes the old window-focus-listener from window-focus-listener-l and returns the resulting multicast listener.
 void Window.removeWindowFocusListener(WindowFocusListener l)
          Removes the specified window focus listener so that it no longer receives window events from this window.
 

Uses of WindowFocusListener in java.awt.event
 

Classes in java.awt.event that implement WindowFocusListener
 class WindowAdapter
          An abstract adapter class for receiving window events.
 

Uses of WindowFocusListener in javax.swing
 

Classes in javax.swing that implement WindowFocusListener
protected  class JMenu.WinListener
          A listener class that watches for a popup window closing.
